context: Roper Technologies is a diversified technology company operating through four segments: Application Software, Network Software & Systems, Measurement & Analytical Solutions, and Process Technologies. Current market capitalization of $51.5B with trailing twelve month revenue of $7.72B. Operates as a holding company with decentralized business model where each portfolio company operates independently. Positions itself as a free cash flow compounder, using excess cash to acquire additional businesses. Faces competitive challenges and threats from intense competition, regulatory challenges, and economic downturns.
